description: This Python source file defines data models using Pydantic for complex input types related to user profiles and tasks, including enums for task priority, and includes tools for creating users and tasks, as well as an agent setup with example usage.

classes.name: UserProfile
classes.description: Pydantic model representing user profile information, including name, email, age, interests, and creation timestamp.

classes.name: TaskPriority
classes.description: Enum class defining priority levels for tasks: low, medium, high, urgent.

classes.name: Task
classes.description: Pydantic model representing a task with title, description, priority, due date, and assigned user.

methods.name: create_user
methods.description: Tool function to create a user profile with validated data, returning a confirmation string.

methods.name: create_task
methods.description: Tool function to create a task with validated data, returning a confirmation string.
